Priest Greymore:
ќоо. It will be not so difficult as it was possible to think. Their mantles. On them necessarily there should be traces of all paternosters and catalysts. If them to subject to due research in laboratory I can learn everything that it is necessary for me. But this work very much very laborious, therefore is required to me as much as possible them лохмотьев. Bring to me not less 100 Lohmotev of the Monk and I can thank you properly. But if will bring it is more, my gratitude also will increase.

Agree
